detailedDescription: The Dyson V15 Detect Absolute revolutionizes cleaning with innovative features including a laser dust detection system that reveals microscopic dust on hard floors. The Anti-tangle hair screw makes cleaning up hair effortless, while the intelligent optimization of suction and run time ensures efficient cleaning across different floor types.
